text: "Woke Up This Morning" is a song by Alabama 3 (also known as A3) from their 1997 album Exile on Coldharbour Lane. The song is best known as the opening theme music for the HBO drama series The Sopranos which used the "Chosen One Mix". There are two versions of the song, the mix The Sopranos used and the original. ==Other websites== *"Woke Up This Morning" lyrics at Metrolyrics.com Category:1997 songs
title: Woke Up This Morning
